title: java.lang.StackOverflowError
body: ### non functional resource merging cause: path collision with PanacheEntityResource resources: error: ``` Error restarting Quarkus java.lang.RuntimeException: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors The stacktrace below has been reversed to show the root cause first.
